---
title: "tern2cart"
---


```
tern2cart(abcz::Matrix{<:Real}, reverse::Bool=false)
```

Converts ternary to cartesian units.

`abcz` is either a Mx3 (a,b,c) or Mx4 (a,b,c,z) matrix
